sql.name: browser
sql.value: select u.cookie_id, u.category_sid, u.event_date, u.behavior_type, u.goods_sid, g.store_sid from recommendation.user_behavior_raw_data u inner join recommendation.goods_avaialbe_for_sale_channel g on g.sid = u.goods_sid and g.sale_status = 4 where dt >= '%s'

sql.name: see.buy
sql.value: select u.cookie_id, u.category_sid, u.event_date, u.behavior_type, u.goods_sid, g.store_sid from recommendation.user_behavior_raw_data u inner join recommendation.goods_avaialbe_for_sale_channel g on g.sid = u.goods_sid and g.sale_status = 4 where u.dt >= '%s'

sql.name: search.category.0
sql.value: SELECT c.lev1_sid, c.lev2_sid, c.lev3_sid, c.lev4_sid, c.lev5_sid, c.channel_sid, g.brand_sid, g.pro_sid FROM idmdata.dim_search_category c INNER JOIN sourcedata.s06_pcm_mdm_goods g ON c.goods_sid = g.sid AND g.dt = '%s'

sql.name: search.category.1
sql.value: SELECT c.lev1_sid, c.lev2_sid, c.lev3_sid, c.lev4_sid, c.lev5_sid, c.channel_sid, g.brand_sid, g.pro_sid, n.sale_cum_amount, n.index_type FROM idmdata.m_sr_eg_goods_num_amount n INNER JOIN idmdata.dim_search_category c ON c.goods_sid = n.goods_code INNER JOIN sourcedata.s06_pcm_mdm_goods g ON g.sid = n.goods_code AND g.dt = '%s' where n.cdate = '%s'

sql.name: buy.goods.sim-1
sql.value: select u.category_sid, u.cookie_id, u.event_date, u.behavior_type, u.goods_sid, g.store_sid from recommendation.user_behavior_raw_data u inner join recommendation.goods_avaialbe_for_sale_channel g on g.sid = u.goods_sid and g.sale_status = 4 where u.dt >= '%s'

sql.name: user.behavior.raw.data
sql.value: select category_sid, cookie_id, event_date, behavior_type, goods_sid from recommendation.user_behavior_raw_data where dt >= '%s'

sql.name: buy.activity.statistic
sql.value: select category_sid, event_date, behavior_type from recommendation.user_behavior_raw_data where dt >= %s

sql.name: browser.not.buy
sql.value: select cookie_id, event_date, behavior_type, category_sid, goods_sid from recommendation.user_behavior_raw_data where dt >= %s

sql.name: hot.sale
sql.value: select u.goods_sid, u.goods_name, u.quanlity, u.event_date, u.category_sid, g.store_sid from recommendation.user_behavior_raw_data u inner join recommendation.goods_avaialbe_for_sale_channel g on g.sid = u.goods_sid where u.dt >= %s

sql.name: search.category.score.spu
sql.value: SELECT c.lev1_sid, c.lev2_sid, c.lev3_sid, c.lev4_sid, c.lev5_sid, c.channel_sid, bd.sid, g.pro_sid FROM idmdata.dim_search_category c INNER JOIN sourcedata.s06_pcm_mdm_goods g ON c.goods_sid = g.sid AND g.dt = '%s' and isnotnull(g.brand_sid) and g.brand_sid <> 'null' INNER JOIN sourcedata.s06_pcm_brand_relation br on g.brand_sid = br.brand_sid AND br.dt = '%s' INNER JOIN sourcedata.s06_pcm_brand_display bd on bd.sid = br.brand_display_sid AND bd.dt = '%s' WHERE isnotnull(bd.sid) AND bd.sid <> 'null' AND isnotnull(c.channel_sid) AND c.channel_sid <> 'null'

sql.name: search.category.score.sell
sql.value: SELECT c.lev1_sid, c.lev2_sid, c.lev3_sid, c.lev4_sid, c.lev5_sid, c.channel_sid, bd.sid, g.pro_sid, n.sale_cum_amount, n.index_type FROM idmdata.m_sr_eg_goods_num_amount n INNER JOIN idmdata.dim_search_category c ON c.goods_sid = n.goods_code INNER JOIN sourcedata.s06_pcm_mdm_goods g ON g.sid = n.goods_code AND g.dt = '%s' INNER JOIN sourcedata.s06_pcm_brand_relation br ON br.brand_sid = g.brand_sid AND br.dt = '%s' INNER JOIN sourcedata.s06_pcm_brand_display bd ON bd.sid = br.brand_display_sid AND bd.dt = '%s' where n.cdate = '%s' AND isnotnull(g.brand_sid) AND g.brand_sid <> 'null' AND isnotnull(c.channel_sid) AND c.channel_sid <> 'null'

sql.name: cate.similarity
sql.value: select category_sid, cookie_id, event_date, behavior_type, goods_sid from recommendation.user_behavior_raw_data where dt >= '%s'

sql.name: goods.for.sale
sql.value: select sid, category_id, store_sid from recommendation.goods_avaialbe_for_sale_channel where sale_status = 4 and stock = 1

sql.name: goods.similarity.in.cate
sql.value: select p.sid, p.mdm_goods_sid, p.category_id, p.brand_sid, p.sale_price, p.value_sid, g.store_sid from recommendation.product_properties_raw_data p inner join recommendation.goods_avaialbe_for_sale_channel g on g.sid = p.sid

sql.name: merchant.shop.goods
sql.value: select sid, store_sid from recommendation.goods_avaialbe_for_sale_channel where store_sid <> 'null' and sale_status = 4 and stock = 1
